content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a Chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)

### Coal Storage at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)

### Coal Storage at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)

### Coal Storage at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)

### Stone Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)

### Inserter System at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5), a Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5), and a Chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drill without fuel
- Ensure the burner mining drill has sufficient fuel before attempting to mine
### Errors when chest at drop position is full
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
### Errors when inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to drop items
### Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has sufficient ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt
